reviewText: These cartoons make it easier to remember certain events in the bible. I enjoyed watching them alot. Very educational in my opinion. They don't make cartoons like this anymore.

The quality is not that great, but it holds true to the bible. There are not frills and deviations from the actual bible stories, so  I would suggest it to anyone who would like to teach thoir kids (ages 4-8) about stories in the bible in an illustrated way. Also get Vol 2.
